import { FormEvent, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { createUserWithEmailAndPassword, getAuth, signInWithEmailAndPassword} from 'firebase/auth'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { IoCloseCircleOutline } from "react-icons/io5"; import _thailand from "../../../data/thailand.json"; import { District } from '../../../types/District'; export const AddressInfo = () => { const history = useHistory(); const [ email, setEmail ] = useState(''); const [ password, setPassword ] = useState(''); const [ cpassword, setCPassword ] = useState(''); const [ district, setDistrict ] = useState(''); const districts = _thailand as District[]; const handleSubmit = async (event: FormEvent) => { event.preventDefault() }; const handleDistrict = () => { setDistrict() } return(
Address Information
Please signup to continue to Pillmate
setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} style={{width: '100%', height: '49px'}}/>
setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password} style={{width: '100%', height: '49px'}}/>
setCPassword(e.target.value)} value={cpassword} style={{width: '100%', height: '49px'}}/>
handleDistrict(e.target.value)} value={district} style={{width: '100%', height: '49px'}}/>
setCPassword(e.target.value)} value={cpassword} style={{width: '100%', height: '49px'}}/>
setCPassword(e.target.value)} value={cpassword} style={{width: '100%', height: '49px'}}/>
setCPassword(e.target.value)} value={cpassword} style={{width: '100%', height: '49px'}}/>
); }
